I've got some unpublished pages still showing up in search results within site search.  Anyone know if these will just go away in time, or is there something else I need to do?
when you click the links in google search are they going to a 404?
Here is a good overview of some options you can take - <https://moz.com/community/q/is-404-ing-a-page-enough-to-remove-it-from-google-s-index>
yup, 404ing.  Thanks <@UG7S8J18D>
site search isnt updating right now, we are working on fixing this
Hey, all. Quick update on the ongoing situation: <https://status.HubSpot.com/incidents/df5scsqc2f6p>. Thanks for bearing with us.

>>> We’ve made significant progress, many tools are back up and running, but we are still working to restore all functionality including email sending. Updates and analytics are still delayed and we are working to restore all data including form submissions, CRM property updates, list enrollments, and messages. We will update here with more information as that data is restored. We will also be posting a more in-depth statement by the end of the day (ET).
Posted 1 minute ago. Mar 29, 2019 - 12:44 EDT

> We are continuing to make good progress. Most critical functionality is now available, including creating and updating records (contacts, companies, deals and tickets) and activities (notes, emails, calls, tasks, and meetings), list processing, exports, and search. We’ve made significant improvements to reporting, though some reports will still be experiencing issues. The team is still working to restore imports, marketing email, and calculated properties. We will continue to update this page as more functionality becomes available. As mentioned previously, we will also be posting a more in-depth statement by the end of the day (ET). Posted 1 minute ago. Mar 29, 2019 - 13:53 EDT

@here Hi peeps! I need someone skilled who can do drag and drop Landing Page in HS in 35 hours. All design materials and text with prototype are ready, you would need to create the template and combine it all together.
